question: Munshi Venu, who passed away recently, was the veteran actor of which film industry?
explanation: Munshi Venu (63), a prominent Malayalam actor, has passed away at Chalakudy in Thrissur, Kerala. He acted in over 75 Malayalam films and will be remembered for his comical characters. He was best known for his roles in Chotta Mumbai, Salt \'n\' Pepper, Kanyaka Talkies, Oru Muthassi Gadha, Immanuel and Daddy Cool.
